  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the main menu controller. Creates a new order and initializes the images.

    • orderDonut

      public void orderDonut(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for ordering donuts. Loads the "OrderDonuts.fxml" file and opens a new stage for ordering donuts.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "Order Donuts" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • orderCoffee

      public void orderCoffee(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for ordering coffee. Loads the "OrderCoffee.fxml" file and opens a new stage for ordering coffee.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "Order Coffee" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • orderSandwich

      public void orderSandwich(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for ordering sandwiches. Loads the "OrderSandwiches.fxml" file and opens a new stage for ordering sandwiches.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "Order Sandwiches" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • viewCurrent

      public void viewCurrent(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for viewing the current order. Loads the "CurrentOrder.fxml" file and opens a new stage for viewing the current order. Updates the current order and all orders after the viewing is complete.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "View Current" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • viewAll

      public void viewAll(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for viewing all orders. Loads the "AllOrders.fxml" file and opens a new stage for viewing all orders.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "View All" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while loading the FXML file.
